titles.title: For the relief of D&S International, Inc.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/21/1996--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named corporation in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States relating to the payment of duties on certain warp knitting machines that were entered at the Port of Charleston, South Carolina.
